text: Robin Peeters (born 30 March 1997) is a Belgian professional footballer who plays for Olympia Wijgmaal in the Belgian Second Amateur Division. Peeters made his professional debut for OH Leuven on 8 January 2017 in the away match against Union SG. == References == Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Oud-Heverlee Leuven players Category:Sint-Truidense V.V. players Category:AS Verbroedering Geel players Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Belgian Second Division/Belgian First Division B players Category:Luxembourg National Division players Category:Expatriate footballers in Luxembourg
title: Robin Peeters
